inn1.comm: length delivery around the off stump line, Dk leans forward to defend to the off side
lovely teasing delivery that shapes away from the off-stump line, DK covers his off stump and shoulders arms

That doesn't help him! Edge and gone! Another failure. It was a length delivery outside the off stump and DK has a lame poke at it. He fished out and got an edge. DK's time as opener (at least on tracks where the ball moves) has to come under immense scanner. Here, he seemed to shape for an on-the-up drive before just wafting softly at it. Just pushed weakly. Limply.
leans forward to defend  compactly to the off side
straightens a touch on the middle stump line, Kohli gets a leading edge back down the track. he was looking to push it to the on side
kicks up from back of length around the off stump line, defended to the off side
hint of movement, really full delivery just outside off stump, pushed out to the off side
on the middle stump line, straightens. Sehwag rushes back to work it through midwicket
lovely cover drive. He leans well across, gets close to the pitch of the curving delivery ,opens the bat-face to adjust to the away movement and drives through cover point
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
just outside off stump, on a length and Virat pushes it to covers.
around the off stump, straightens again, Sehwag presses back and presents the full bat-face in defense. The ball rolls back down the track.
stays back to punch it out to covers. He mistimed that as he was moving back towards the leg stump and had to reach out to play well away from the body.
Edged but falls short of mid-off. It was another delivery that straightens, this time on the middle and leg line, Sehwag shaped to work it through midwicket but got the leading edge
around the off stump line, squeezed out to point. Free hit coming up!

low dipping full toss outside off stump, Sehwag stays back and tries to drive through the off side but the ball dips on him and he makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat. The ball rolls to mid-on
just outside off stump, from short of length, pushed out to point.
Hmm .. let me explain my hmm.. ! : It was a fullish delivery just outside off stump and Kohli leaned across to fetch it from there and wristed it down to fine-leg region
stays back to push the length delivery out to covers
full in length and Virat drives neatly to the right of covers where Guptill makes a fine diving stop. His team-mates applaud the effort
gets forward to push this to extra cover for a single
high bouncer and Sehwag ducks. Ashoka signals that it's the one for the over. Sehwag looks at the square-leg umpire who is nodding in agreement to Ashoka
back of length and straightening outside off stump, Sehwag goes back to steer it down to third man
Wristy clip! it was the back-of-length delivery on the middle stump or thereabouts, Virat pressed back and used that length to wrist it past square-leg. Crispy!
around the off stump line, punched out to mid-off
gets well back to tap this to midwicket
fullish and down the leg side, Sehwag tries to flick it up and over but fails to connect
Twhack! Thanks for bowling it in the slot! It was right up there - full and in the driving range- and Sehwag blasts it through covers. Full clean swing of the bat.

She Wag! Short and wide, carved away to backward point boundary. Well, it wasn't exactly a wide but since Sehwag stays so adjacent to the line, and wonderfully still, he can make use of the slightest width
And that's his 1000th ODI four. He got that recently in the Tests as well. It was a short-of-length delivery around off stump and Sehwag pressed back to punch it on the up and through extra cover.
on a length this time and straightening around off stump, pushed out to covers
in the corridor, left alone by Virat
on the off and middle, wristed to the on side
around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side

Virat is stunned. He doesn't move. He stares at the umpire Ashoka. He looks at his partner. Now he stirs into action and walks away slowly. Very slowly. This is what happened: It was a length delivery just outside off stump and Virat pushed out at it, bat away from the body. The keeper went up straight away. The fatal finger went up. Got to see the replays to confirm the edge. Replays in: There was some noise plus the snickometer shows there was a nick!
slants away from Yuvraj who pushes inside the line. The keeper collects. Some extra bounce on that
around the off stump line, defended to covers
around the off-stump line, he inside-edges it to his pad
stays behind the line to defend
on the pads, rolls away to the on side
he clears the front foot and forces it down to long-on
Whiplash! It was the short-of-length delivery outside off stump, Sehwag is well inside the crease, leans further back and carves it up and over backward point
Ala Gordon Greenidge there! He stood up on one leg, fetched the short-of-length delivery from the off stump and whipped it through midwicket. Very Greenidgeish  I must say ..
full and curving away, left alone
stays back to push this one to the on side of the pitch
around the off-stump line,. pushed to covers
in the zone outside off stump, shapes away, Yuvraj lets it go through to the keeper
full in length around the off stump line, Yuvraj was hanging on the back foot as if he expected a short delivery and was very late in getting forward eventually to get some bat on it
gets forward this time, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
in the off-stump channel and Yuvraj lets the keeper collect. Fine over this.
gets back to turn it to the on side

What a fine shot this is! It was a full-length delivery around the off stump, he waited for it to arrive, opened the bat-face and just steered it past backward point. No violence. Almost like what Laxman would have done.
the bouncer on the leg stump line and Sehwag ducks
Up and over! It was the length delivery and he went on the up and through the line and over to the left of mid-off. Two bounces and it goes past the boundary
Hmm ..! He backed away outside leg stump this time and carved a length delivery on the middle to backward point
on the leg and middle line, whipped to deep midwicket

Fine shot and even better fielding. It was the shortish delivery outside off and Sehwag flashed it past backward point. Southee ran across from his wide third man position and dived neatly in the end to stop it
stays back to wrist this back-of-length delivery to square-leg. They would do well to pitch it up a bit for Yuvraj, on a length around the off stump ..
short in length again, punched back to the bowler
very high and harmless bouncer. Wide
around the off stump line, short in length, Yuvraj tries to punch on the up but bottom edges it to the off side
just outside the off stump, again tries to punch on the up but edges it to the on side
Gorgeous! It was the full-pitched delivery outside off stump and Yuvraj leaned forward to caress it through covers. High front elbow and all that jazz.
goes back to work this short-of-length delivery past square-leg
the length delivery arrives, in the zone outside off, and Yuvraj shoulders arms
on the middle stump line, straightens, turned behind square-leg
short in length and on the leg and middle line, Sehwag, aware that the fine-leg was up in the circle, went back and across, got almost outside the line and wristed it past that short fine-leg fielder
stays back to work this one through to deep midwicket
goes back to defend a length delivery back to the bowler
shortish, angling away from Sehwag who runs it down to third man

hmm .. it was a length delivery that straightened outside off, Yuvraj was moving towards the leg stump as if he thought it would come in .. he lunged out in the end, bat away from the body, to jab it out to the off.

And he is gone now. Again the balance was all awry. It was a shortish delivery outside the off stump and he went for the pull but only top edged it and the keeper jogged back to collect it.  It climbed just below chest high and Yuvraj tried to pull it from well outside off stump. That did him in.
the bouncer on the middle stump line, Sehwag sways away
gets behind the line to defend to covers
this one slips down the leg side ..
back of length , on the middle, tucked towards midwicket for a single
pushes this to the on side
the shortish delivery, around chest-high, on the off and middle, Sehwag arches back to create his own room where none seemed to exist and upper cut/steered it to third man
banged in short outside off, left alone
full in length, on the pads, tucked behind square-leg
short in length on the middle and off, Sehwag presses back to push it to right of mid-on for a single

he has had problems with the short delivery and the pull shot. He falls to another faulty pull. This one wasn't even that short .. Raina was quick to get on to the back foot but pulled it  to short midwicket fielder who lunged to his right to take a good catch. It was not a short ball, just back of a length,  but Raina perhaps was anticipating a short ball and went back for the pull. He made contact with the top half of the bat.
on the back foot and flicks it behind square-leg
lunges forward to jab the length delivery to the off
It was the bouncer and Dhoni was late to duck and it brushed his helmet on the way to the keeper
short in length and there is some extra bounce on this ... Dhoni jabs at it and it brushed the pad high and moved to the keeper
Sehwag wages on a lone battle. He leans forward, waits on the slower one and crashes it inside-out over covers!
this one slips down the leg side for a wide
on the middle and leg line, turned past square-leg
on a length on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
gentle back-of-length delivery outside off stump and Dhoni leans back to flash it through backward point
length delivery outside off stump and Dhoni drives on the up through covers ..... Very easily done .. He just drove through the line there
turns this one to the square-leg region
banged in short outside off stump, steered to third man
kicks up outside off stump, Dhoni goes back to push at it and the ball flies past the edge
fullish outside off stump, Dhoni edges the square-drive to third man
stays back to clip the short-of-length delivery to the on side

Almost caught at third man. It was the short ball just outside off and he arched back to upper cut it.. He steered it up and over well to the left of the third man fielder placed wide.  Southee rushed to his left and threw in a dive but couldn't reach the ball .. .. Valiant effort
gets forward to push this one away for a single
pushes this one on the up and chips in the air clear of the bowler
presses back to work this to deep midwicket
floats this off break on the middle and leg line, turned past square-leg
really full, and straight, driven to long-off
on the middle stump line, slow off cutter, worked to short midwicket
fullish, just outside the leg stump, Sehwag clears the front foot and tries to whip it away but only manages to squeeze it back down the track
short in length around the off stump line, worked past square-leg
low full toss, dips on Dhoni who jabs it to mid-on
banged in short on the middle and moves away, Dhoni sways away
presses back to defend a length delivery to the off side
short in length that straightens just outside off, Dhoni stutters and ends up pushing well inside the line of the delivery. The keeper collects. It wasn't that far away from the off stump
off cutter around off stump, driven to the off side of the pitch and Styris makes a tumbling stop

hit just past the bowler it was the off cutter on the leg and middle line, Sehwag stays beside the line of the delivery and drives it on the up and in the air just past the lunging bowler . Stryis tried to reach out with his left hand but couldn't reach
gets forward to defend to the on side
fullish, on the middle, lunges out to stab it to the on side
short in length on the middle, punched down to long-on
that slow off cutter, fullish, driven down to long-off
leans forward to drive to deep cover
checks his shot and almost chips it back to the bowler .. it went just wide of the bowler ..
fetches it from outside off and swipes it to deep midwicket
pushes this well wide outside off stump
moves across to push it to the off side for a single
leans forward to drive to long-off
Hello! That was a very high short ball! The keeper leaped to bring it back to earth! He was standing up the stumps
backs away to drive to long-off
full in length on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
floated full on the leg and middle, squeezed behind square-leg
on the pads, tries to swat it to fine-leg but jabs it to square-leg
on the leg and middle line, turned behind square-leg
on the pads, turned around the corner for a single
floated around off and middle, forced wide of long-on for couple of runs .. Mills was slow to get to the ball and Sehwag seizes the op to call Dhoni for the second
gets back to punch it to long-on
flighted on a length outside off and Sehwag reaches across for the big square drive and ends up slicing it over point
goes back to punch it back to the bowler
turns from well outside off, Sehwag goes for a big sweep shot but doesn't connect
leans forward to push to covers
punches this one down to long-on
around the off stump line, full on a length, tapped towards non striker
around the leg stump line, Sehwag went back, opened his stance and tried to to lap it around to fine-leg ... it goes of the pad ..  the fielder throws in a dive but his elbow touches the ropes ..
short and  outside off and Sehwag carves it up and over backward point. The pressure when you bowl to Sehwag - you can never give him any width..
leans forward to drive to long-on
backs away to punch it to the bowler
tries to cut this one away but doesn't connect
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
fetches this from well outside off and swipes it across the line! The short midwicket fielder intercepts.
reaches across outside off and chips this in the air towards sweeper cover
gets forward to punch this one away for a single
works this to short midwicket..
backs away outside leg to dab the off break to straightish short midwicket
lunges across in his typical fashion to push it to covers
drags it short and Dhoni forces it towards deep midwicket
slips this down the leg side
moves outside leg and punches the off break that turns into the leg stump to covers!
flighted delivery and it has been dragged down to long-on
stretches well forward to push it to covers
Blast! He pressed forward and tonked the flighted delivery right over the straight boundary!
inside-out carve! He reached well forward, fetched the ball from outside off and lifted it over to the right of sweeper cover who makes a mess of it . He should have covered that one
gets forward to drill this - he hit it really hard - to long-off
floated outside off stump, Dhoni tries to push it to point and misses .. The keeper doesn't collect cleanly
leans across to drive to covers
this one spins down the leg side
leans forward to on drive but misses .. the ball turns to hit his body
stays back to defend this off break to the leg side
almost walks out to push this off break to short midwicket
turns from outside off stump, Dhoni backs away to steer it very late and through backward point. Morrison informs on air that this is the first boundary of Kane's bowling
goes back to dab this off break to midwicket
on the middle stump line, Dhoni gets forward to push it to midwicket
leans forward to drive to sweeper cover
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
gets back to defend the length delivery to the off side
fine delivery .. that straightens outside off and Dhoni is beaten, pushing inside the line
And again. Unlucky not to get the edge both times
just outside off stump, steered to backward point
backs away to slice this past point for a single
spins down the leg side for a wide
moves down the track and smears this down to long-on . He ended up dragging it down
Fab strike! He leaned forward to drive it inside-out over extra cover. Superbly struck
goes back to guide it to point for a single
gets forward to defend it back to the bowler
stretches forward to on drive to long-on
moves down the track and then adjusts to the shortening of the length by pushing it to covers
shuffles across to flick the full delivery to deep backward square-leg region
pushes it to right of midwicket and sets off for a single but Sehwag sends him back .. Dhoni turns and dives to get back to the crease..
lifting delivery outside off, left alone
full in length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
banged in short, tapped behind square-leg
goes back to swat this to midwicket
moves down the track and tries to work it across the line and is hit on the body
flighted full, on driven to long-on
Lovely inside-out whack! It was a flighted delivery outside off stump and Sehwag stretches forward to go inside-out. And he crashes it over extra cover.
100 up! And he gets there with a gentle push through cover point. They were collapsing all around him but he stood firm and has come up with yet another fab knock. Whaddaplaayaaa
stays back to push it back to the bowler
an edge or a deliberate steer? it is 80 per cent deliberate, he was looking to steer it fine, but it got finer than he wanted, for four past the wicketkeeper
oh this is 100 per cent deliberate, no doubt after that, flick-glance from in front of the stumps, deliberately fine of fine leg, superb shot
slower ball, Sehwag's bat has to check its speed when coming down, but he does well
moving into the pads, misses, but gets a leg-bye
looks to work it into the leg side from off and middle, ends up playing it back to the bowler
short outside off, shapes to cut but pulls out
around the off stump line, leans across to go inside-out again .. superbly done square drive
He has holed out at deep midwicket. He picked the flighted delivery from outside off and swung it straight to the fielder. Out after another fine knock. Valuable and entertaining.
leans forward to push it to short midwicket
full and outside off, dhoni plays for the turn and tries to steer it to point but is beaten
More troubles as Dhoni tries to drive against the turn , through covers ala Sehwag but edges it to the on side
gets back to punch the short-of-length delivery through the off side
gets back to defend the length delivery to the off side
fullish, on the middle and off, Dhoni uses that bottom-hand to whip it through midwicket
kicks up from short of length just outside off and Jadeja is beaten, pushing inside the line

shortish delivery outside off, Jadeja presses back, hops and punches it pretty awkwardly but some how manages to get the ball through cover point! He seemed in no position to play that kind of a shot but either by design or not, has managed to punch it through the off side
short and climbing, pushed to the on side of the pitch.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
moves down the track and works it wide of midwicket for a single
pushes it through quickly outside off, left alone
slower, closer to the off, left alone again
stretches well forward to defend to the off side
floated full around off, turned to midwicket
short and wide, cut away to sweeper cover
short in length, on the off stump line, pushed out to covers
full in length, Jadeja is late in getting forward but drives to covers
short in length and kicks up outside off. Jadeja hops to punch it to deep point ...Last time around he hit a boundary and had his back towards the bowler .. this time he didn't twist his body so much
slips down the leg side for a wide
shortish, pulled away for a single
short and moving down the leg side for another wide
stays back to defend the short-of-length delivery to the off
this one is on the hips and Jadeja whips it away to the backward square-leg boundary. Neatly clipped away
gets forward to on drive to long-on
leans forward to tap it to cover point for a quick single. dhoni made that call
tossed up full, driven through point
leans forward to squeeze it back down the pitch
gets forward to off drive ...
the off cutter on the middle and leg, tapped to the on side
Short in length and Jadeja moves to 15 with a neat cut shot. he leaned back to crack it past backward point
leans forward to defend to the off
floated outside off stump, left alone
reaches across to drive the off cutter to deep cover
just outside off stump, sliced out to backward point
on the off stump line, punched back towards the bowler who makes a tumbling stop
on the pads, turned behind square-leg for a easy single

Nathan takes out Dhoni. It was a flighted delivery outside off that didn't turn in. Dhoni lunged out for the square drive and edged it behind!  Hopkins caught it on the rebound. It had popped out but he crouched quickly to take it again
flighted on the off, defended to the on side
fullish, driven back to the bowler
on the middle and off, Pk jabs it to the on side
hops to get on top of the shortish delivery and pushes it to the off side

The readers' curse strikes! Done in by the bouncer. It reared up sharply at Jadeja who had no clue;. he hopped, took his eyes of the ball and fended it in an ungainly manner. The ball popped up for a easy catch behind the stumps.
Another fine bouncer, Nehra stands tall and jabs it away .. he stabbed it to his body
fuller, on the middle, Nehra reads the length late but manages to lunge out to stab it away
another one that kicks up towards the rib cage .. Nehra jabs it out to the off side .. bat and body ..
fuller, on the middle and leg, Nehra is hanging way back inside the crease, brings his bat in front to keep the ball out
leans forward to defend
fullish outside off ,squeezed through point
floated full around off, tapped t othe off side
turns in from outside off, worked towards short midwicket
leans forward to defend to point
bouncer on the middle and leg line, Pk takes the bottom-hand of the handle and jabs it down to the on side
fuller and PK gets forward to steer it through point

Smash! He moved outside leg stump and flat-batted the short ball - just above waist high- between the bowler and mid-off. A forehand whack! And he, as ever, doesn't show much emotion. Just stands there before slowly walking towards his partner.
the slower one this time and PK pushes it out to the off
goes for the bouncer and it flies down the leg side. Pk gets out of the way and HOpkins dives to deflect it
slower one, gets behind the line to defend down the track
cuts in from short of length, Nehra pushes out at it and edges it to his hip
fullish, PK backs away to drive it hard towards long-on
flighted on the middle and off, almost scooped to short midwicket
leans forward to dab this to the off side
What a soft dismissal! It was flighted really full and Nehra scooped it straight back to the bowler. A golf putt.
tossed up outside off, Ishant is beaten, pushing inside the line
driven well to the left of Nathan, who like his brother Brendon, makes a spectacular diving stop
And PK too combusts spontaneously.. He moved outside the leg stump and top-edged the intended flat-batted pull to mid-on. Gone!
banged in short outside off stump, Munaf backs away to steer it down to third man
short ball, Ishant shapes to duck before realising it hasn't climbed all that high and jabs it behind square-leg
backs away again and tries that steer/dab/chop and the ball rolls to backward point
short of length delivery and Munaf moves to leg and chops it to point
kicks up outside off, Munaf thinks about his trademark shot - back away to the on and chop through gully - but decides against it
swing and a miss. Ishant moves outside leg and has a wild swish at it
cuts in towards middle, pushed out to the off side
length delivery around off, steered to backward point
short and rising outside off, run down to third man
short delivery outside off, Munaf tries that chop behind off but no wood on leather
moves outside leg to stab the short-of-length delivery to the on side of the pitch
Ishant gets inspired by Munaf and tries the Munaf-chop! He moved outside leg and went for a crude cut and the ball flew of the edge over the keeper
around the off stump, run down to third man
high bouncer and it flies over Munaf
More vital runs. India reach 220. It was the short delivery around off stump and Munaf does what Munaf does - moves outside leg and chops it .. eyes shut! the ball flies over slips
goes for the yorker, Munaf backs away for the big drive and edges it behind square-leg .. SOuthee has a few things to say at Munaf
really full delivery on the leg stump line, eased to mid-on
in the zone outside off, full in length, left alone
And again! He backs away and runs the ball down to third man
length delivery outside off, punched away to sweeper cover
Munaf rushes down the track for the big lofted hit. But he didn't pick the slower one. He ended up lobbing it straight up. It went really high before it came down at mid-on. India all out 223

inn2.comm: slight swing away, runs off the thick outer edge, to third man for one

plumb! dead plumb! PK is celebrating and appealing at the same time. He plays for swing, and consequently down the wrong line. But this one goes straight on, and he ends up playing around the front pad and misses. Caught right in front
wide, really wide, swinging away
superb outswinger, moving away from back of a length, squares him up, the ball hits him in the back thigh and falls short of first slip - they steal a leg-bye
watchfully defends this back to the bowler
moves away from outside off, moves away too far
this outswinger is closer to the stumps, but not close enough to make him play
there's the inswinger, the change-up delivery, Watling does well to get the bat down in time
and a superb inswinger to begin with, and a big lbw shout, pitching in front of leg, straightening and hitting. Asoka, though, doesn't give it
back of a length, punched away to point
full, nicely driven, but can't beat extra cover
shortens the length, Taylor defends off the front foot
swings into him from back of a length - this is Nehra's speciality, swinging from short lengths - hits him high on the back pad
swinging into the pads, misses, is hit on the pad - maiden over
full outswinger, Watling reaches to drive, to point
closer to the stumps, swinging away, defended well
another outswinger, short of driving length, gets a thick edge to third man
shortish delivery, defended outside off
punched into the covers, finds the fielder
outswinger to finish the over, Taylor stretches forward and shoulders arms
swinging into him, played with soft hands, towards midwicket
wide down the leg side
swinging in from short of a length, hits him in the thigh again
swinging in again, around off, defended to cover
it's that big inswinger from back of a length again! Pitches around off, and jags back in, Watling plays it onto the stumps as he looks to steer clear of this delivery
big appeal right away for lbw, but this is pitched outside leg, and Asoka gets it right
full outside off and left alone
swinging into him, gets an edge onto the pad, then through to Dhoni, on the bounce
shot! Taylor's famous quick hands. In a flash he cuts this - hardly wide enough for the cut - into the ground, and there is so much power behind this it bounces over point
short and wide this time, and he plays the orthodox cut, between point and cover-point, in the air

four, four, and gone! PK comes back superbly. Outswinger gets the edge. Close to off, just short of driving length, Taylor hangs the bat, ball takes a healthy edge, and Dhoni dives in front of first slip to take the catch
left alone outside off, big outswinger
closer to off with this outswinger, making him play, and he defends it to point
short, just outside off, left alone

another big lbw shout, they are testing Asoka here. Hit right in front, but saved by an inside edge perhaps? Replays not good enough to determine whether it is bat on pad, or inside edge. Enough doubt, though
shoulders arms outside off
moves across to cover the swing, defends
wide down the leg side
defended off the front foot, towards cover
again slips too far down the leg side
short outside off, shoulders arms
full, around off, punched away to mid-off
tries for too big an outswinger, starts from outside leg, concedes leg-byes
leaves this outswinger outside off be
punched on the up, straight to mid-off
swinging away from off, left alone
another outswinger allowed to go through to the keeper - another maiden over
and starts off with a wide down the leg side
finds the right area this time, around off, holding its line, defended to cover
this one moves in from around off and middle, and slips down the leg side
back to the off-stump channel, defended to cover
hits the same spot, defended back to him
into the pads, and Elliot gets off the mark with a single worked down to fine leg - gets off the mark with it - first run off the bat in 18 deliveries
moving in, turned away to midwicket
back of a length, around off, steered away to third man
length ball, no swing this time, pushed to mid-on
this one moves in from just outside off, Styris is hurried into jabbing at it, good job that he keeps it down
into the pads, worked away to square leg - not finding gaps
again, nice-looking drive, but straight to cover

gone! played on! India on top. Back of a length, Styris looks to force it through the off side, but his feet are stuck, ends up playing away from the body, and the inside edge tickles the leg bail over
he runs but this won't count, it's a leg-bye, swinging too far down the leg side, and kissing the pad on the way
sharp inswinger, aiming at the off stump, and he keeps it out
stand up and applaud, Williamson is off the mark. Jokes apart, this will be a relief - only four other batsmen have scored ducks in their first three ODI innings - steers this to third man
gets onto the front foot to push this to mid-off
punched away off the back foot, to cover-point
another shout for lbw, but pitched down the leg side - Elliot moving too far across, though
short of a length, just outside off, pushed to mid-off
left alone outside off
left alone outside off
finally a gap is found, punched off the back foot, between mid-off and extra cover
left alone outside off, swinging away
angling into the pads, takes a single just wide of mid-on
looks to play at the outswinger, but then pulls out
swings in, stays back and defends
angled across him, left alone
straying down the leg side, gets a leg-bye to fine leg
on the front foot to dead-bat this fullish delivery
turns his wrists on this, with the swing, gets a single wide of mid-on
punched away off the back foot, nice-looking shot, gets a single between mid-off and extra cover
starts with a full delivery, hit back to the bowler
squares him up with the slight straightening of the line with this length delivery
straying down the leg side, worked away into the vacant space for two
down the pads again, and Munaf is releasing pressure here, nicely clipped away past midwicket for four
big shout for lbw, and there is just as big an inside edge on this one, moving in from just outside off, and the edge saves him as he looks for an off drive
down the pads again, and he clips it past midwicket again
moving in from around off, beats him as he looks to turn to leg, but is hit high on the thigh - hence no appeal
worked away from around off, to deep square for one
punched on the up, from outside off, but can't beat cover
punched one bounce to Raina at cover
again punched one bounce to Raina at cover - and Raina is shying at the stumps every time, PK at mid-on is getting a working over backing up
again punched straight to Raina at cover, but he doesn't go for the stumps
back of a length, patted back to the bowler
fuller, but still played back to him - not great pace - he has been around 130ks
on and around off, and pushed towards mid-on, 131ks
shuffles across, opens the face, gets a single to third man
loose drive outside off, and the slight away movement beats his bat - that's more of what Munaf will want
shortish, into the body, hit to square leg
well bowled, loose shot! Back of a length, holding its line from outside off, and Elliot plays away from the body, just misses the edge
gets closer to this one, guides it to third man
nice-looking drive around off line, straight to mid-off
back of a length, hit back to the bowler

big offcutter, finds the gap between bat and pad! This is the in-between length, and it cuts through Williamson's defence, getting a faint inside edge on the way through. The ball that first brought Ishant fame, the big in-dipper
back of a length, played to point
into the pads, worked around the corner for one
defended off the back foot
around off again, Hopkins stretches well forward and defends
plays across the line, there is a half appeal for lb, but they know it is swinging down the leg side

Munaf is among the wickets too! Another ball that jags back n, this time from just outside off, beats his defence, and umpire Rauf has no second thoughts while ruling him out lbw. It's taking out the middle stump
wide down the leg side
left alone outside off
defends a fullish delivery towards mid-on
defended off the back foot
flicked away off the pads, but can't beat midwicket
short and wide - that was the ball that could release some pressure, but he plays all around it
full and straight, he plays across the line, is beaten, but the ball is perhaps sliding down the leg side, hence the stifled appeal
punched off the back foot, and again he finds the cover fielder
back of a length, turned away to midwicket
beautiful delivery, holding its line outside off, asking him to play at it but then leaving him, just beats the edge
closer to off, punched down to mid-off
NZ not finding any gaps at all - hit straight to cover again
middle and leg, played straight to midwicket
"yeah, yeah, no" - that's the call on this one as he hits this firmly slightly to the right of midwicket - maiden over results
full, on the pads, takes a single to fine leg
bouncer, well outside off, and it is cut off the toe end, over point
again the big in-dipper, sails over the off stump, cutting him into two
inside edge this time, misses the stumps by inches, gets a single to square leg
only the fourth boundary of the innings, straying into the pads, and he helps it to the square-leg boundary
defended off the back foot
back of a length, pushed to mid-on
flicked to midwicket
slightly slower ball, runs off the outside half of the bat towards point

punched off the back foot, extra cover knocks it off to mid-off. Meanwhile PK at mid-on has forgotten there is a runner, and is excitedly running towards the stumps for what he thinks is an easy run-out. Munaf tells him then, "woh udhar bhaag raha hai". He is running there. Amusing
Munaf gets another! His accuracy works again. Pitched off and middle, moving in, and he plays across the line, missing it altogether, and is dead plumb
hit to point with an open face
big indipper again, missing leg stump, hence the half shout
worked off the pads for one
short outside off, he steers clear
jags back in again, defended around off
full ball, wide, deliberately bowled there, Mills looks for the big drive without feet movement, gets the toe end
wafts at it wide outside off, is beaten
full into the pads, played to midwicket
Munaf gets three! Short ball around off, and he plays the limp pull shot, the top edge settles peacefully with mid-off
on the pads, played to square leg
left alone outside off
goes for the big hit down the ground, Munaf is interested but it sails over mid-off
accurate bouncer, he is beaten on the pull shot
New Zealand get closer to avoiding their lowest score - 64. This one is short, and he has pulled it through midwicket for four
they have avoided that lowest total of theirs, this is a better shot, pulled over mid-on, clean clean strike
shot! crunched away through point. This was short and wide, he rocked back and cut it away
pulls away, but connects only air
full and wide, driven square, but doesn't find a gap
lovely shot! what a way to become top-scorer of the innings, nicely punched square of the wicket, to the left of point and right of third man
and Jadeja has been smoked over cow corner for six! First sight of spin, and he got under it and connected it sweetly
and Dhoni's trick works! Six and out! Southee looks for another six, and this time he gets too much under it and finds long-on
defended around off
flat and fast, defended back
flat into the pads, played straight to midwicket
length ball outside off, steered to third man for one
slower ball, gets a single to wide of mid-on
bouncer, accurate, ducks under it
short ball, pushed to point
short around off, left alone
jags back in towards middle, defended back to the bowler
looks to cut, gets the toe end
another six off Jadeja, smote over his head, what a clean strike, almost into the sight screen
and another six! New Zealand inch towards 100, and this is a superb hit too. Shimmies down, and lofts it straight over his head. Lovely connection
nearly yorks him this time
squeezed past extra cover for one
full ball, played back to the bowler
backs away, PK follows him with a short ball, and he pulls it past short fine leg, Mills is enjoying here
flat flat six! Lovely pull shot! Backs away again, PK looks to bounce him, and doesn't have the pace to do so, and he has murdered it over square leg. NZ five short of Sehwag's 110
slower ball, played uppishly, falls short of Nehra at mid-off, and they take two off the misfield
another bouncer, this time Mills pulls out of the pull shot
shot! Mills take NZ past Sehwag's 110! Makes room, has ages to set himself up for this slower ball and he flat-bats it between bowler and mid-off. Lovely entertainment from Mills
hit powerfully again, just wide of mid-off. Nehra makes a diving save, Mills retains strike
full and wide outside off, beaten
down the leg side, kisses the pad, hence not a wide
slower ball, beats him, but it bounces in front of Dhoni, and it seems to have hit that injured middle finger of his right hand. Grimace. Pain. Audible pain
fifty for Mills! Thanks for the entertainment. Opens the face and lofts it over the cover ring. Fifty off 32 balls
looks to go along the ground this time, but can't beat that four-men cover ring
quick delivery, back of a length, beats him, but it sails over the stumps
defended off the front foot by McKay
steered past short third man... Mills thinks of a single but comes back for two
full ball, driven to long-off
big appeal for lbw, but it is spinning away, and has only about kissed the pad on the way to the pad. Impossible to call for the ump
flat into the pads, beats him
and again, smeared into the pads, no run
PK hasn't had to move an inch at long-on to take this catch. The slower ball does it for India, Mills looks to hit this out of the ground but finds long-on
